name: Lumber Joe
description:
Lumber Joe needs cash! 

Climb the tree and chop off branches and get those sweet gold coins!

Don't lose your focus: miss a branch and you smash into the ground.
-------------------------------------------

Controls:
[Space bar] to jump
[Down arrow] to chop
[M] to Mute the music

----------------------

Credits:

Art and concept - Galit "shoze" Weisberg

Programming - Antonio Felaco

Music - Carmin Bittermann
